name: A Mangy Wolf
text: Unearthly howls drive the wildlife mad.

name: Rottooth
text: Incorporeal or not, those claws hurt!

name: Cutthroat Willie
text: WANTED: For doing exactly what his name suggests.

name: Grubb the Swampdrinker
text: An iron gut, and quite the throwing arm.

name: Groddo the Bogwarden
text: Dead emerge from the swamp. It's not a pleasant scent.

name: Manhunter Ivan
text: Watch your step, this traitor is an expert trapper.

name: Gnomenapper
text: A collector of gnomes. Real ones.

name: Experiment 3C
text: It's a Murloc! It's a Dragon! It's... everything?

name: Sazzmi Gentlehorn
text: This satyr has a tendency to attract more than just rats.

name: Blood Witch Gretta
text: Magic is powerful in her grove… but it comes at a cost.

name: Gnarlroot
text: Gnarled, twisting roots, splintering to life.

name: Niira the Trickster
text: She plays with wee critters… until they’re big critters.

name: The Scarecrow
text: His enchanted scythe drinks deep from every harvest.

name: Inquisitor Hav'nixx
text: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. It's far too delicious.

name: Chupacabran
text: It used to feed on local livestock. Now it hungers for more.

name: Griselda
text: Watch those lips, she'll kiss just about anything.

name: Wharrgarbl
text: The Witchwood's curse has not been kind to the local Murlocs.

name: Ravencaller Cozzlewurt
text: The feathered fiends of Gilneas flock to his sinister call.

name: Forlorn Lovers
text: Bound by vows, she just won't let go.

name: Splintergraft
text: She'll take a piece of you and make it her own.

name: Brushwood Centurion
text: This once-stalwart defender of the woods now sows chaos.

name: Baran the Blind
text: Poor vision doesn't matter with strength like his.

name: Gravekeeper Damph
text: The rattle of bones remain a comfort to him.

name: Doctor Sezavo
text: It’s good to give blood. But not to him. He’s not a real doctor.

name: Cultist S'thara
text: A silver tongue to accompany her silver daggers.

name: Vitus the Exiled
text: Corrupted. Banished. Hungry.

name: Shudderwock
text: And 'lo in uffish thought he stood, crying "Battle" in the wood.

name: Infinite Toki
text: One either dies a hero or mangles time enough to become a villain.

name: Glinda Crowskin
text: The leader of Hagatha’s dark cult hides behind her loyal minions.

name: The Whisperer
text: Do you hear the echoes of his whispers?

name: Garrow, the Rancorous
text: Missing? Dead? He'll still collect.

name: Crooked Pete
text: The locals report that Pete is up to no good again.

name: Cragtorr
text: Seeds sewn from hatred, sustained by dark magic.

name: Azalina Soulthief
text: Her children's safety is her top priority. At any cost.

name: Face Collector
text: Beware his terrible minions and their ever-shifting faces.

name: Raeth Ghostsong
text: There's a reason you should burn the dead.

name: Grum
text: Grum likes to smash. He also likes to bash. And crash.

name: Lord Godfrey
text: The Lord of Shadowfang Keep has a bullet to pick with Crowley.

name: Captain Shivers
text: Vowing vengeance, his cursed crew haunts Gilnean shores.

name: Gustave, the Gutripper
text: Hagatha’s pet eats his way from the bottom of the food chain up.

name: Sephira Dusktalon
text: Even your own magic can be twisted by these woods.

name: Winslow Tobtock
text: His tricks will leave you both in a daze.

name: Gobbles
text: Every dying beast makes this dreaded carrion bird stronger.

name: Ratcatcher Hannigul
text: Rats aren't always the most loyal pets.

name: Plaguemaster Rancel
text: Dying to his touch is terrible. Living is even worse.

text: Passive After you play a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.

displayName: Passive ability triggered: First Aid Kit
text: Passive At the end of your turn, restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.

text: (Tracker only) Passive Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (1) less.

text: (Cannoneer only) Passive Whenever you fire your Cannons, reduce the cost of a card in your hand by (2).

text: (Cannoneer only) Passive Your Cannons do 1 extra damage.

text: Passive Whenever your weapon is destroyed, equip a random weapon.

text: Passive Your minions have +2 Health.

text: Passive Your minions cost (1) less.

text: Passive After your opponent plays a minion, deal 1 damage to it.

name: Rewind
text: (Time-Tinker only) Passive When your hero dies, restart the game and remove this from your Dungeon Deck.

name: Double Time
text: (Time-Tinker only) Passive After you cast your first spell in a turn, cast a copy of it (targets chosen randomly).

text: Passive Double your starting Health.

text: Passive Start with an extra Mana Crystal.

name: Sic 'Em
text: (Houndmaster only) Summon 3 minions from your deck with the highest attack.

name: Butch
text: (Houndmaster only) Rush Has +1/+1 for each friendly Beast that died this game.

name: Bubba
text: (Houndmaster only) Battlecry: Summon six 1/1 Bloodhounds to attack an enemy minion.

name: Princess
text: (Houndmaster only) Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattles of 3 random minions in your deck.

name: Blood Moon
text: Give your minions +1/+1 and Lifesteal.

name: Shaw's Shank
text: (Houndmaster only) Has +1 Attack for each friendly minion you control.

name: Exterminate
text: (Tracker only) Echo. Deal 10 damage to a minion and any excess to the enemy hero.

name: Hunter's Insight
text: (Tracker only) Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by (3).

name: Bandage
text: Restore all friendly minions to full Health. They can attack again this turn.

name: Hunter of Old
text: (Tracker only) Whenever you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +2.

name: The Exorcisor
text: Silence any minion attacked by this weapon.

name: Frenzied Trapper
text: (Tracker only) Battlecry: Put 5 random Hunter Secrets into the battlefield.

name: Tools of the Trade
displayName: Treasure played: Tools of the Trade
text: (Tracker only) Discover one of Tess's weapons and equip it. Return this to your hand.
completedText: You played Tools of the Trade

name: Safe Harbor
text: Choose a minion and put it into your hand. It costs (0).

name: Grizzled Reinforcement
text: (Cannoneer only) Battlecry: Summon an extra Cannon.

name: Tuskarr Raider
text: (Cannoneer only) Rush After this minion attacks, fire your Cannons.

name: Seabreaker Goliath
text: (Cannoneer only) Costs (1) less for each time you've fired your Cannons.

name: Gattling Gunner
text: Whenever you play a card, deal damage equal to its Cost to a random enemy minion.

name: Cartographer
text: Battlecry: Discover a Treasure.

name: Gilnean Vigilante
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and fill your hand with Coins.

name: Holy Book
text: Silence and destroy a minion. Summon a 10/10 copy of it.

name: Brass Lantern
text: Discover a copy of a card in your deck. Repeat this 2 more times.

name: Sneak Attack
text: Put 2 random minions from your hand into the battlefield and give them Charge.

name: Spyglass
text: Echo Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into yours. It costs (3) less.

name: Bestiary
text: Fill your board with copies of random minions from your opponent's deck.

name: Coin Pouch
text: Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Sack of Coins
text: Summon a random 6-Cost minion. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Hefty Sack of Coins
displayName: Treasure played: Hefty Sack of Coins
text: Summon a random 3, 6, and 9-Cost minion.
completedText: You played Hefty Sack of Coins

name: Creepy Curio
text: Summon three 1/1 Ghosts. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Haunted Curio
text: Summon three 2/2 Ghosts. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Cursed Curio
text: Summon three 3/3 Ghosts with Lifesteal.

name: Ricochet Shot
text: Deal 3 damage to a random character. Repeat this 12 times.

name: Surly Mob
text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Angry Mob
text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Crazed Mob
text: Silence and destroy all enemy minions.

name: Royal Gift
text: Give a minion +2/+2 for each minion you control.

name: Gentleman's Top Hat
text: Give a minion +2/+2 and "Deathrattle: Give your Top Hat to another random friendly minion."

name: Nalaa the Redeemer
text: Divine Shield. Taunt. After this minion survives  damage, gain Divine Shield.

name: Murloc Holmes
text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, add a copy to your hand.

name: Hallowed Water
text: Restore your hero to full Health.  Draw 5 cards.

name: Gilnean Tracker
text: Rush At the start of your turn, transform this into a 5/5.

name: Transforming Tracker
text: Rush At the start of your turn, transform this into a 7/7 with Windfury.

name: Worgen Tracker
text: Rush Windfury

name: Old Militia Horn
text: Give your minions +1/+1 and Taunt. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Militia Horn
text: Give your minions +2/+2 and Taunt. Upgrade this and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Veteran's Militia Horn
text: Give your minions +4/+4, Taunt, and Divine Shield.

name: Pristine Compass
text: Draw a card and add 2 extra copies of it to your hand. They cost (0).

name: Beastly Beauty
text: Rush After this attacks a minion and survives, transform this into an 8/8.

name: Chaos Theory
text: (Time-Tinker only) Both players cast all spells in their hand (targets chosen randomly).

name: Enhance-a-matic
text: (Time-Tinker only) Add a random spell from each class to your hand.

name: Stroke of Midnight
text: (Time-Tinker only) Echo Destroy a random enemy minion.

name: Impetuous Companion
text: (Time-Tinker only) Battlecry: Swap hands with your opponent.

name: Clockwork Assistant
text: (Time-Tinker only) Has +1/+1 for each spell you've cast this game.

name: Puzzle Box
text: (Time-Tinker only) Transform all minions into random ones that cost (3) more.

name: Chuck
text: Discard all minions from your hand and deal their Attack to the enemy hero.

name: Sack of Gnomes
text: Fill your board with random Gnomes.

name: Amalgamate
text: Destroy all minions. Summon an Amalgamation with the combined Attack and Health.

name: Enchanting Tune
text: Gain control of all enemy minions. Set their Attack and Health to 1.

name: Scythe
text: Doesn't lose Durability. When you kill a minion with this weapon, gain +1 Attack.

name: Murloc Infestation
text: Give your minions: "Deathrattle: Summon a random Murloc."

name: Grave Mistake
text: Trigger all minions' Deathrattles twice.

name: Shallow Graves
text: Summon 7 random minions that died this game.
